page.title: 16Community Police.
page.content: In the past a Police Constable was stationed here. He lived in the police house in High St.and patrolled the district keeping law and order. Now we have two community policemen stationed at Pencoed, so they have a bigger area to patrol. P.C.Hammond and P.C.Smith spend much time here and are very active in the life of the village. P.C.Smith visits the school often and teaches cycling proficiency to the older children. Both policemen are very kind and helpful and we like them very much. They arrange visits to the police museum, games etc. and are always making sure we are safe. Sadly, P.C.Smith has been posted to Bridgend and will be leaving us soon. We will miss him very much but will give a warm welcome to his successor. (Group C.) R.T.
